授業方法:
*The format and schedule may change during the semester, depending on student needs, interests, numbers and the evolving coronavirus situation.

This class will develop students' speaking and listening through doing debates. Debate, rather than conversation, will be the focus of the class. Students will be gradually introduced to the language and skills needed for debate, and will take part in practice debates. Students will engage in active learning: working individually, in pairs, groups and as a whole class to debate global issues, developing cross-cultural awareness, and improve academic and language skills. The class will be conducted face-to-face. Assignments/homework/assessments will be conducted, and lesson information/resources provided, on Google Classroom. As such, students will need access to a computer at home. BYOD to class is recommended. Students will also need a notebook for notetaking and for creating their own debate 'textbook'
